You have a blatent misconception of the plumbing trade in this country. The vast majority of plumbers are not licensed and do not require a license to perform simple work and that includes Houston Texas. Simple plumbing work which does not require work permits are perhaps 60 percent of all plumbing work performed in this country, and the other 40 percent which require local inspections are either performed by a licensed plumber or a licensed plumber's permit is used to pass the inspection of work performed by an unlicensed journeyman.  Is it any wonder, Obama ahead by 19 points, Democrats and thinking Republicans alike are saying, "so long, no thank you -- it hasn't been good to know you at all."
 
 There are so many reasons for thinking people for vote for Obama/Biden, it's mind boggling.
